about_the_game:
Hentai Babe Buffy - Expanded Content - Do jigsaw puzzle in a new sexy way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Hentai Babe Buffy - Expanded Content is designed for adults.

With this DLC you will unlock Hentai Babe Buffy - Expanded Content with 51 extra Puzzles.

Features:
- 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces!
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Support multiple screen sizes.
- 51 sexy puzzles
- Bondage elements
- Traditional puzzle gameplay combined with hot hentai girls
- Pleasuring puzzle atmosphere
- Beautiful puzzle artworks
- Auto saving, never lose your progress (saves every single puzzle)
- Zoom option
- Move around to easily keep track of your puzzle pieces
